original_title: Coldplay: Live at Austin City Limits
overview: With an alluring, melodic pop sound and multi-instrumental arrangements, English, alternative-rock band, Coldplay has enchanted audiences everywhere over the years. Coldplay’s second appearance on ACL’s stage is another milestone for the historic show and a one-of-a-kind episode with the band’s unique production.
title: Coldplay: Live at Austin City Limits
